title: 1.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Develop a quiz in Scratch with at least three questions on a science or math topic you have recently learned in your class.Program the sprite to ask the questions and collect the responses from your friend. The correct answer should be displayed by the sprite immediately after each response

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
